document_data.name: Larres
document_data.mainbody: metime around the [[Shadovar invasion of Wheloon]], Larres lived as a druid at the circle of Thorngap in the [[King's Forest]]. Unfortunately, the druid [[Halsaime]] became corrupted by the powers of his [[Halsaime's staff|vile staff]] and became a malevolent force of nature. Larres was one of those that joined his cause, either of his own accord or the powerful will that Halsaime exerted, and protected [[Thorn Hollow]] with his companion [[dire bear]]s until they were overcome by [[Harper]] agents sent from [[Eveningstar]] by [[Kirinel Zay]].
document_data.History: Sometime around the [[Shadovar invasion of Wheloon]], Larres lived as a druid at the circle of Thorngap in the [[King's Forest]]. Unfortunately, the druid [[Halsaime]] became corrupted by the powers of his [[Halsaime's staff|vile staff]] and became a malevolent force of nature. Larres was one of those that joined his cause, either of his own accord or the powerful will that Halsaime exerted, and protected [[Thorn Hollow]] with his companion [[dire bear]]s until they were overcome by [[Harper]] agents sent from [[Eveningstar]] by [[Kirinel Zay]].
